verses.verse: וַיִּקְח֞וּ <WH3947> took כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עַ֤ם <WH5971> Then all the people יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah אֶת־ <WH853> עֻזִּיָּ֔הוּ <WH5818> Uzziah וְה֕וּא <WH1931> who בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיַּמְלִ֣יכוּ <WH4427> and made him king אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> the place אָבִ֥יו <WH1> in the room of his father אֲמַצְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH558> Amaziah

ה֚וּא <WH1931> He בָּנָ֣ה <WH1129> He built אֶת־ <WH853> אֵיל֔וֹת <WH359> Eloth וַיְשִׁיבֶ֖הָ <WH7725> and restored לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> it to Judah אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after שְׁכַֽב־ <WH7901> slept הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> with his fathers פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שֵׁ֨שׁ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years עֻזִּיָּ֣הוּ <WH5818> [was] Uzziah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> fifty וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> and two שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> His mother's [יְכִילְיָה כ] (יְכָלְיָ֖ה <WH3203> Jecholiah ק) מִן־ <WH4480> at יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> did אֲמַצְיָ֥הוּ <WH558> Amaziah אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> according to all that his father

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> continued לִדְרֹ֣שׁ <WH1875> And he sought אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> in the days זְכַרְיָ֔הוּ <WH2148> of Zechariah הַמֵּבִ֖ין <WH995> who had understanding בִּרְאֹ֣ת <WH7200> in the visions הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וּבִימֵי֙ <WH3117> and as long as דָּרְשׁ֣וֹ <WH1875> he sought אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִצְלִיח֖וֹ <WH6743> made him to prosper הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God ס

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> And he went forth וַיִּלָּ֣חֶם <WH3898> and warred בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> against the Philistines וַיִּפְרֹ֞ץ <WH6555> and brake down אֶת־ <WH853> ח֣וֹמַת <WH2346> the wall גַּ֗ת <WH1661> of Gath וְאֵת֙ <WH853> חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> and the wall יַבְנֵ֔ה <WH2996> of Jabneh וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> and the wall אַשְׁדּ֑וֹד <WH795> of Ashdod וַיִּבְנֶ֣ה <WH1129> and built עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> cities בְּאַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <WH795> about Ashdod וּבַפְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> and among the Philistines

וַיַּעְזְרֵ֨הוּ <WH5826> helped הָֽאֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> And God עַל־ <WH5921> against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֧ים <WH6430> him against the Philistines וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against [הָעַרְבִיִּים כ] (הָֽעַרְבִ֛ים <WH6163> Arabian ק) הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> that dwelt בְּגוּר־ בָּ֖עַל <WH1485> in Gurbaal וְהַמְּעוּנִֽים׃ <WH4586> and the Mehunims

וַיִּתְּנ֧וּ <WH5414> gave הָֽעַמּוֹנִ֛ים <WH5984> And the Ammonites מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> gifts לְעֻזִּיָּ֑הוּ <WH5818> to Uzziah וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> extended שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> and his name עַד־ <WH5704> against לְב֣וֹא <WH935> [even] to the entering מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in of Egypt כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הֶחֱזִ֖יק <WH2388> for he strengthened עַד־ <WH5704> against לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> [himself] exceedingly

וַיִּ֨בֶן <WH1129> built עֻזִּיָּ֤הוּ <WH5818> Moreover Uzziah מִגְדָּלִים֙ <WH4026> towers בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem עַל־ <WH5921> and שַׁ֧עַר <WH8179> gate הַפִּנָּ֛ה <WH6438> at the corner וְעַל־ <WH5921> and שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> gate הַגַּ֖יְא <WH1516> and at the valley וְעַל־ <WH5921> and at הַמִּקְצ֑וֹעַ <WH4740> and at the turning וַֽיְחַזְּקֵֽם׃ <WH2388> [of the wall] and fortified

וַיִּ֨בֶן <WH1129> Also he built מִגְדָּלִ֜ים <WH4026> towers בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> in the desert וַיַּחְצֹב֙ <WH2672> and digged בֹּר֣וֹת <WH953> wells רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> many כִּ֤י <WH3588> for מִקְנֶה־ <WH4735> cattle רַּב֙ <WH7227> for he had much הָ֣יָה <WH1961> had ל֔וֹ וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֖ה <WH8219> both in the low country וּבַמִּישׁ֑וֹר <WH4334> and in the plains אִכָּרִ֣ים <WH406> husbandmen וְכֹֽרְמִ֗ים <WH3755> [also] and vine dressers בֶּהָרִים֙ <WH2022> in the mountains וּבַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <WH3760> and in Carmel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֹהֵ֥ב <WH157> for he loved אֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> husbandry הָיָֽה׃ <WH1961> had ס

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> had לְעֻזִּיָּ֡הוּ <WH5818> Moreover Uzziah חַיִל֩ <WH2428> had an host עֹשֵׂ֨ה <WH6213> men מִלְחָמָ֜ה <WH4421> of fighting יוֹצְאֵ֧י <WH3318> that went out צָבָ֣א <WH6635> to war לִגְד֗וּד <WH1416> by bands בְּמִסְפַּר֙ <WH4557> according to the number פְּקֻדָּתָ֔ם <WH6486> of their account בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> by the hand [יְעוּאֵל כ] (יְעִיאֵ֣ל <WH3273> Jeiel ק) הַסּוֹפֵ֔ר <WH5608> the scribe וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֖הוּ <WH4641> and Maaseiah הַשּׁוֹטֵ֑ר <WH7860> the ruler עַ֚ל <WH5921> under יַד־ <WH3027> under the hand חֲנַנְיָ֔הוּ <WH2608> of Hananiah מִשָּׂרֵ֖י <WH8269> captains הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> [one] of the king's

כֹּ֠ל <WH3605> the whole מִסְפַּ֞ר <WH4557> The whole number רָאשֵׁ֤י <WH7218> of the chief הָאָבוֹת֙ <WH1> of the fathers לְגִבּ֣וֹרֵי <WH1368> of the mighty men חָ֔יִל <WH2428> of valour אַלְפַּ֖יִם <WH505> [were] two thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וְעַל־ <WH5921> against יָדָם֩ <WH3027> And under their hand חֵ֨יל <WH2426> army צָבָ֜א <WH6635> appointed time שְׁלֹ֧שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֗לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> and seven אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred עוֹשֵׂ֥י <WH6213> that made מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> war בְּכֹ֣חַ <WH3581> power חָ֑יִל <WH2428> with mighty לַעְזֹ֥ר <WH5826> to help לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king עַל־ <WH5921> against הָאוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> against the enemy

וַיָּכֶן֩ <WH3559> prepared לָהֶ֨ם <WH1992> like עֻזִּיָּ֜הוּ <WH5818> And Uzziah לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הַצָּבָ֗א <WH6635> for them throughout all the host מָגִנִּ֤ים <WH4043> shields וּרְמָחִים֙ <WH7420> and spears וְכ֣וֹבָעִ֔ים <WH3553> and helmets וְשִׁרְיֹנ֖וֹת <WH8302> and habergeons וּקְשָׁת֑וֹת <WH7198> and bows וּלְאַבְנֵ֖י <WH68> [to cast] stones קְלָעִֽים׃ <WH7050> and slings

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ ׀ <WH6213> And he made בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֨ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem חִשְּׁבֹנ֜וֹת <WH2810> engines מַחֲשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH4284> invented חוֹשֵׁ֗ב <WH2803> by cunning men לִהְי֤וֹת <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> to be on הַמִּגְדָּלִים֙ <WH4026> to be on the towers וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on הַפִּנּ֔וֹת <WH6438> and upon the bulwarks לִירוֹא֙ <WH3384> to shoot בַּֽחִצִּ֔ים <WH2678> arrow וּבָאֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> stones גְּדֹל֑וֹת <WH1419> and great וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> spread שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> withal And his name עַד־ <WH5704> far לְמֵ֣רָח֔וֹק <WH7350> far abroad כִּֽי־ <WH3588> till הִפְלִ֥יא <WH6381> for he was marvellously לְהֵעָזֵ֖ר <WH5826> helped עַ֥ד <WH5704> against כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָזָֽק׃ <WH2388> he was strong

וּכְחֶזְקָת֗וֹ <WH2393> But when he was strong גָּבַ֤הּ <WH1361> was lifted up לִבּוֹ֙ <WH3820> his heart עַד־ <WH5704> against לְהַשְׁחִ֔ית <WH7843> to [his] destruction וַיִּמְעַ֖ל <WH4603> for he transgressed בַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> against the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> his God וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> and went אֶל־ <WH413> about הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> into the temple יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְהַקְטִ֖יר <WH6999> to burn incense עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> upon the altar הַקְּטֹֽרֶת׃ <WH7004> of incense

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> went in אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> after עֲזַרְיָ֣הוּ <WH5838> And Azariah הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> the priest וְעִמּ֞וֹ <WH5973> with כֹּהֲנִ֧ים ׀ <WH3548> priests לַיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD שְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <WH8084> him and with him fourscore בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> men חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> [that were] valiant

וַיַּעַמְד֞וּ <WH5975> And they withstood עַל־ <WH5921> and עֻזִּיָּ֣הוּ <WH5818> Uzziah הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> and said לוֹ֙ לֹא־ <WH3808> and will have no לְךָ֣ עֻזִּיָּ֗הוּ <WH5818> unto him [It appertaineth] not unto thee Uzziah לְהַקְטִיר֙ <WH6999> to burn incense לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> but to the priests בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the sons אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> of Aaron הַמְקֻדָּשִׁ֖ים <WH6942> that are consecrated לְהַקְטִ֑יר <WH6999> to burn incense צֵ֤א <WH3318> go out מִן־ <WH4480> out הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <WH4720> of the sanctuary כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מָעַ֔לְתָּ <WH4603> for thou hast trespassed וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and will have no לְךָ֥ לְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> neither [shall it be] for thine honour מֵיְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> from the LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

וַיִּזְעַף֙ <WH2196> was wroth עֻזִּיָּ֔הוּ <WH5818> Then Uzziah וּבְיָד֥וֹ <WH3027> in his hand מִקְטֶ֖רֶת <WH4730> and [had] a censer לְהַקְטִ֑יר <WH6999> to burn incense וּבְזַעְפּ֣וֹ <WH2196> and while he was wroth עִם־ <WH5973> with הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> with the priests וְ֠הַצָּרַעַת <WH6883> the leprosy זָרְחָ֨ה <WH2224> even rose up בְמִצְח֜וֹ <WH4696> in his forehead לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> the priests בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> and לְמִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> altar הַקְּטֹֽרֶת׃ <WH7004> from beside the incense

וַיִּ֣פֶן <WH6437> looked אֵלָ֡יו <WH413> about עֲזַרְיָהוּ֩ <WH5838> And Azariah כֹהֵ֨ן <WH3548> priest הָרֹ֜אשׁ <WH7218> the chief וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> and all the priests וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold ה֤וּא <WH1931> himself מְצֹרָע֙ <WH6879> upon him and behold he [was] leprous בְּמִצְח֔וֹ <WH4696> in his forehead וַיַּבְהִל֖וּהוּ <WH926> and they thrust him out מִשָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> of there וְגַם־ <WH1571> also הוּא֙ <WH1931> himself נִדְחַ֣ף <WH1765> from thence yea himself hasted לָצֵ֔את <WH3318> also to go out כִּ֥י <WH3588> because נִגְּע֖וֹ <WH5060> had smitten יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> because the LORD

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become עֻזִּיָּ֨הוּ <WH5818> And Uzziah הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מְצֹרָ֣ע ׀ <WH6879> was a leper עַד־ <WH5704> against י֣וֹם <WH3117> unto the day מוֹת֗וֹ <WH4194> of his death וַיֵּ֜שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt in בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> house [הַחָפְשׁוּת כ] (הַֽחָפְשִׁית֙ <WH2669> several ק) מְצֹרָ֔ע <WH6879> [being] a leper כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִגְזַ֖ר <WH1504> for he was cut off מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְיוֹתָ֤ם <WH3147> and Jotham בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> his son עַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> [was] over the king's שׁוֹפֵ֖ט <WH8199> judging אֶת־ <WH853> עַ֥ם <WH5971> the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> of the acts עֻזִּיָּ֔הוּ <WH5818> of Uzziah הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <WH7223> first וְהָאֲחֲרֹנִ֑ים <WH314> and last כָּתַ֛ב <WH3789> write יְשַֽׁעְיָ֥הוּ <WH3470> did Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֖וֹץ <WH531> of Amoz הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <WH5030> the prophet

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֨ב <WH7901> slept עֻזִּיָּ֜הוּ <WH5818> So Uzziah עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֗יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקְבְּר֨וּ <WH6912> and they buried אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָיו֙ <WH1> him with his fathers בִּשְׂדֵ֤ה <WH7704> in the field הַקְּבוּרָה֙ <WH6900> of the burial אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לַמְּלָכִ֔ים <WH4428> which [belonged] to the kings כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אָמְר֖וּ <WH559> for they said מְצוֹרָ֣ע <WH6879> He [is] a leper ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned יוֹתָ֥ם <WH3147> and Jotham בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ
